title: Raw cacao milkshake

ingredients.content: 1 ½ tbsp raw cacao powder, to taste

preparations.content: Place all ingredients into mixing bowl and blend <b>40 sec/speed 9<b>, until smooth and frothy.

hintsAndTricks: <b>Cacao and nut butter milkshake<b>: Add 1 tbsp almond butter or peanut butter.
<b>Lightly spiced cacao milkshake<b>: Add ½ tsp cinnamon or cardamom.
<b>Dairy-free milkshake<b>: Replace the cow's milk with almond or soy milk.
If you’d like to try a cacao substitute, try using carob powder – it should be caffeine and theobromine free.
You can also use pure maple syrup or rice malt syrup in place of the honey.
